name: Projekt
overview: Project You should undertake a journey to the moon, which is divided into five phases. In the first phase you have to load your rocket as much as possible with the necessary fuel for the takeoff and the moon landing. The second phase is used for the actual moon landing, the fourth for the start of the moon and the return to the space base. In between, one should discover as many uranium deposits as possible with the help of a Geiger counter, which represents phase three. Released as part of Computronic 1984/09 and in a combo pack with Alien-Destroyer.
